hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
set -e
rm -f versions.latest versions.built
tbl-dctrl -c Package -c Version -d';' -H ../../JOB-Debian-sid/workspace/Sources > versions.latest
while read pv ; do p="`echo $pv | cut -f1 -d';'`" [ -d ../../sid-goto-cc-$p/builds ] || continue set +e l="`ls -rt ../../sid-goto-cc-$p/builds/ | grep ^[0-9] | tail -n 1`" [ x$l != x ] || continue v="`grep -a -m1 "^dpkg-buildpackage: source version" ../../sid-goto-cc-$p/builds/$l/log | cut -f4 -d" "`" set -e [ -n "$v" ] || continue echo "$p;$v" >> versions.built done < versions.latest
